scripts.minify: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-json
scripts.minify-css: cd public/resources/css && minify app.css && minify keyboard.css
scripts.minify-json: cd public/resources/config && json-minify validations.json > validations.min.json && json-minify aus-states.json > aus-states.min.json
scripts.build: set NODE_ENV=production&& npm run lint && npm run minify && npm version prerelease && webpack && npm run generate:build
scripts.generate:build: rimraf build && npm run copy:build && npm run clean:build
scripts.copy:build: copyfiles -e **/*.js.map -a public/**/* build && copyfiles -u 1 public/*.js.map build
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean:build:js && npm run clean:build:css && npm run clean:build:json && npm run clean:build:sourcemap
scripts.clean:build:js: cd build/public/resources/js && rimraf dragscroll.js es5-shim.js es6-shim.js later.js simple-scrollbar.js
scripts.clean:build:css: cd build/public/resources/css && rimraf app.css keyboard.css reset.css simple-scrollbar.css
